00032 /* debug builds only */
00033 #ifdef DEBUG
00034 
00035 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"
00036 
00037 #include "bmesh.h"
00038 
00039 #include "bmesh_mesh_validate.h"
00040 
00041 
00042 /* macro which inserts the function name */
00043 #if defined __GNUC__ || defined __sun
00044 #  define ERRMSG(format, args...) { fprintf(stderr, "%s: " format ", " AT "\n", __func__, ##args); errtot++; } (void)0
00045 #else
00046 #  define ERRMSG(format, ...) { fprintf(stderr, "%s: " format ", " AT "\n", __func__, __VA_ARGS__); errtot++; } (void)0
00047 #endif
00048 
00054 int BM_mesh_validate(BMesh *bm)
00055 {
00056     int errtot;
00057 
00058     BMIter iter;
00059     BMVert *v;
00060     BMEdge *e;
00061     BMFace *f;
00062 
00063     int i, j;
00064 
00065     errtot = -1;
00066     fprintf(stderr, "\n");
00067     ERRMSG("This is a debugging function and not intended for general use, running slow test!");
00068 
00069     /* force recalc, even if tagged as valid, since this mesh is suspect! */
00070     bm->elem_index_dirty |= BM_ALL;
00071     BM_mesh_elem_index_ensure(bm, BM_ALL);
00072 
00073     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (v, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH, i) {
00074         if (BM_elem_flag_test(v, BM_ELEM_SELECT | BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) == (BM_ELEM_SELECT | BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00075             ERRMSG("vert %d: is hidden and selected", i);
00076         }
00077 
00078         if (v->e) {
00079             if (!BM_vert_in_edge(v->e, v)) {
00080                 ERRMSG("vert %d: is not in its referenced edge: %d", i, BM_elem_index_get(v->e));
00081             }
00082         }
00083     }
00084 
00085     /* check edges */
00086     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, i) {
00087         if (e->v1 == e->v2)
00088         ERRMSG("edge %d: duplicate index: %d", i, BM_elem_index_get(e->v1));
00089     }
00090 
00091     /* edge radial structure */
00092     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH, i) {
00093         if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT | BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) == (BM_ELEM_SELECT | BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00094             ERRMSG("edge %d: is hidden and selected", i);
00095         }
00096 
00097         if (e->l) {
00098             BMLoop *l_iter;
00099             BMLoop *l_first;
00100 
00101             j = 0;
00102 
00103             l_iter = l_first = e->l;
00104             /* we could do more checks here, but save for face checks */
00105             do {
00106                 if (l_iter->e != e) {
00107                     ERRMSG("edge %d: has invalid loop, loop is of face %d", i, BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->f));
00108                 }
00109                 else if (BM_vert_in_edge(e, l_iter->v) == FALSE) {
00110                     ERRMSG("edge %d: has invalid loop with vert not in edge, loop is of face %d", i, BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->f));
00111                 }
00112                 else if (BM_vert_in_edge(e, l_iter->next->v) == FALSE) {
00113                     ERRMSG("edge %d: has invalid loop with next vert not in edge, loop is of face %d", i, BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->f));
00114                 }
00115             } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != l_first);
00116         }
00117     }
00118 
00119     /* face structure */
00120     BM_ITER_MESH_INDEX (f, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH, i) {
00121         BMLoop *l_iter;
00122         BMLoop *l_first;
00123 
00124         if (BM_elem_flag_test(f, BM_ELEM_SELECT | BM_ELEM_HIDDEN) == (BM_ELEM_SELECT | BM_ELEM_HIDDEN)) {
00125             ERRMSG("face %d: is hidden and selected", i);
00126         }
00127 
00128         l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00129 
00130         do {
00131             BM_elem_flag_disable(l_iter,    BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
00132             BM_elem_flag_disable(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
00133             BM_elem_flag_disable(l_iter->e, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
00134         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00135 
00136         j = 0;
00137 
00138         l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(f);
00139         do {
00140             if (BM_elem_flag_test(l_iter, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG)) {
00141                 ERRMSG("face %d: has duplicate loop at corner: %d", i, j);
00142             }
00143             if (BM_elem_flag_test(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG)) {
00144                 ERRMSG("face %d: has duplicate vert: %d, at corner: %d", i, BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->v), j);
00145             }
00146             if (BM_elem_flag_test(l_iter->e, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG)) {
00147                 ERRMSG("face %d: has duplicate edge: %d, at corner: %d", i,  BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->e), j);
00148             }
00149 
00150             /* adjacent data checks */
00151             if (l_iter->f != f) {
00152                 ERRMSG("face %d: has loop that points to face: %d at corner: %d", i, BM_elem_index_get(l_iter->f), j);
00153             }
00154             if (l_iter != l_iter->prev->next) {
00155                 ERRMSG("face %d: has invalid 'prev/next' at corner: %d", i, j);
00156             }
00157             if (l_iter != l_iter->next->prev) {
00158                 ERRMSG("face %d: has invalid 'next/prev' at corner: %d", i, j);
00159             }
00160             if (l_iter != l_iter->radial_prev->radial_next) {
00161                 ERRMSG("face %d: has invalid 'radial_prev/radial_next' at corner: %d", i, j);
00162             }
00163             if (l_iter != l_iter->radial_next->radial_prev) {
00164                 ERRMSG("face %d: has invalid 'radial_next/radial_prev' at corner: %d", i, j);
00165             }
00166 
00167             BM_elem_flag_enable(l_iter,    BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
00168             BM_elem_flag_enable(l_iter->v, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
00169             BM_elem_flag_enable(l_iter->e, BM_ELEM_INTERNAL_TAG);
00170             j++;
00171         } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00172 
00173         if (j != f->len) {
00174             ERRMSG("face %d: has length if %d but should be %d", i, f->len, j);
00175         }
00176     }
00177 
00178 
00179 
00180     ERRMSG("Finished - errors %d", errtot);
00181 
00182     return TRUE;
00183 }
00184 
00185 
00186 #endif
